attributes.action: Make meat/animal products as easily identifiable as allergens on food packaging
attributes.additional_details:
Vegetarianism and Veganism is on the rise with an estimated 700% increase in vegans in the last two years alone. 
https://www.livekindly.co/number-of-vegans-in-the-uk-surges-by-700-in-just-two-years/
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/food-and-drink/news/number-of-vegans-in-britain-rises-by-360-in-10-years/
attributes.background: Around 1 in 5 people in the UK are now vegetarian/vegan yet food shopping for us is still a struggle. There's no regulation for foods containing animal products to be easily identifiable and shopping takes much too long. Foods with animal products should be as easily identifiable as allergens.
